content: designer tiny van hengel @designbytiny was inspired to design these socks by a little fox in the forests of the eifel in germany fritz the fox the socks are made with our strong and sustainable sock yarn durable soqs and have a cute fox motif choose your favorite colors from 51 colors of durable soqs size 1 m 21- 23 5cm foot circumference size 2 l 23 5 26 5cm foot circumference design design_by_tiny
